sections.title: Introduction
sections.content:
Table content:
Device | CPI/USB ID | Working?
GPU | 8086:46aa | Yes
Audio | 8086:51cc | Yes
Wireless | 8086:51f0 | Yes
Bluetooth | 8087:0033 | Yes
Touchpad |  | Untested
Webcam | 8086:465d | No
Fingerprint sensor | 27c6:63ac | Yes
27c6:6382 | No
Ambient light sensor | 8086:51fc | Yes

sections.title: Audio
sections.content: This laptop requires Sound Open Firmware for the sound card to work.

sections.title: Suspend
sections.content:
Suspend wakes up immediately (after 4 seconds). Changing wakeup devices in /proc/acpi/wakeup does not change anything. To workaround that:

```
# echo disabled > /sys/bus/i2c/devices/i2c-VEN_0488\:00/power/wakeup
```

sections.title: Ambient light sensor
sections.content: Install iio-sensor-proxy to enable automatic brightness in Gnome.

sections.title: See also
sections.content: - Ubuntu 20.04 LTS Webcam and Fingerprint Driver
